title: IDOLiSH7: Second Beat! (IDOLiSH7 Second BEAT!)
synopsis: Following their performance at the Black or White event, the idol group IDOLiSH7 is at the height of its popularity, with offers for various concerts and work coming in every day, much to the joy of the seven boys and their manager. However, as their fame continues to rise, Riku Nanase's health begins worsening due to the heavy workload.
characters: ['Nanase, Riku', 'Ousaka, Sougo', 'Yotsuba, Tamaki', 'Izumi, Iori', 'Izumi, Mitsuki', 'Rokuya, Nagi', 'Nikaidou, Yamato', 'Kujou, Ten', 'Yaotome, Gaku', 'Sunohara, Momose']
